Uses of Package
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence

  • Packages that use com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm
    Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context
    Provides the classes necessary for configuring the Infinitum ORM module.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the ORM context framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.internal
    Provides internal ORM utility classes.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence
    Provides the classes necessary for mapping and persisting data between domain objects and database tables.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the persistence framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest
    Provides the classes necessary for RESTful object-relational mapping.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful ORM framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite
    Provides the classes necessary for SQLite object-relational mapping.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm 
    Class and Description
    TypeAdapter
    Facilitates the mapping of datastore values to Java data types.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context 
    Class and Description
    PersistencePolicy
    Provides a runtime resolution policy for model persistence based on the Infinitum configuration.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context.impl 
    Class and Description
    PersistencePolicy
    Provides a runtime resolution policy for model persistence based on the Infinitum configuration.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.internal 
    Class and Description
    PersistencePolicy
    Provides a runtime resolution policy for model persistence based on the Infinitum configuration.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence 
    Class and Description
    PersistencePolicy.Cascade
    Used to indicate an entity's cascade mode.
    TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType 
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.impl 
    Class and Description
    PersistencePolicy
    Provides a runtime resolution policy for model persistence based on the Infinitum configuration.
    PersistencePolicy.Cascade
    Used to indicate an entity's cascade mode.
    TypeResolutionPolicy
    This interface provides runtime resolution of data types for the purpose of persistence in the ORM.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest
